chicago, cpanel, ddos protection, hostworld, kvm, shared, uk September 13, 2020 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Hostworld is back with some nice KVM offers based in the UK and Chicago.  They come jam-packed with neat add-on features, such as unmetered bandwidth, DDOS protection (UK only), and a free 60GB of backup storage.

Hostworld has appeared here on LEB several times since January 2020 we conducted an interview with him in August 2020.

Hostworld is also re-offering their shared hosting offering, which includes unlimited bandwidth and domains, cPanel, LiteSpeed, and CloudLinux.

Their WHOIS is public and they are registered in the UK (company number 12330877). You can check out their TOS and Privacy Policy.  They accept PayPal, credit/debit cards, Bank Transfer, Apply Pay, Bitcoin, Alipay, and Unionpay.

Here’s what they had to say: 

“As a company we are extremely proud of the services we offer and strive to offer the best possible service to all of our customers. We focus on performance, customer support and maintaining our network – providing excellent customer service is a priority to us. We strive to provide you with the most cost effective, reliable service in the industry offering an outstanding 99.9% uptime guarantee. We aren’t a middle man, all of our servers are co located to our private rack space in Maidenhead, UK. Our team has had extensive experience within the hosting industry over the past 10 years. We originally started as a website development company offering website design packages since 2017, however we have now expanded online to offer web hosting services.“
